column4: hi i have an issue with my xampp. i keep getting this another mysql daemon is running whenever i restart my computer. i ran ps aux |grep mysql i get the following http://paste.ubuntu.com/446473/  this process pid 897 keeps starting up. how do i make sure it doesnt starts all the time? is it because i chose automatically start programs in my startupservice?
please help. i have asked many times today. i have not received any responses.
xamp is not supported, see lamp
install from the repos, no need to be in /opt
